context.nepali: एउटा गाउँका मानिसहरूमा गरिएको सर्वेक्षणमा, 60% ले सुन्तला मन पराउँछन्, 50% ले स्याउ मन पराउँछन् र 20% ले दुवै फलफूल मन पराउँछन् ।
context.english: In a survey conducted among people of a village, 60% like oranges, 50% like apples and 20% like both fruits.

sub_questions.label: a
sub_questions.question_nepali: दुवै फलफूल मन नपराउने मानिसहरूको प्रतिशत कति छ ?
sub_questions.question_english: What is the percentage of people who like neither fruit?
sub_questions.explanation_english:
Explanation: Let total percentage $n(U) = 100\%$. Using the formula for union: $n(O \cup A) = 60 + 50 - 20 = 90\%$. Those who like neither = $100\% - 90\% = 10\%$.
Citation: Lesson 1

context.nepali: रु. 10,000 को 10% वार्षिक ब्याजदरले कति वर्षमा चक्रीय ब्याज रु. 2,100 हुन्छ ?
context.english: In how many years will the compound interest on Rs. 10,000 at 10% p.a. be Rs. 2,100?

sub_questions.label: a
sub_questions.explanation_nepali:
चक्रीय मिश्रधन $(CA) = 10000 + 2100 = 12100$। सूत्र $CA = P(1 + \frac{R}{100})^T$ अनुसार, $12100 = 10000(1.1)^T \Rightarrow 1.21 = (1.1)^T \Rightarrow (1.1)^2 = (1.1)^T \Rightarrow T = 2$।
उद्धरण: पाठ २
sub_questions.explanation_english:
Explanation: Compound Amount = $12,100$. Using formula $12100 = 10000(1.1)^T$, we get $1.21 = (1.1)^T$, so $T=2$ years.
Citation: Lesson 2

context.nepali: एउटा कम्प्युटरको मूल्य रु. 40,000 छ । यदि यसको मूल्यमा वार्षिक 20% ह्रास आउँछ भने:
context.english: The price of a computer is Rs. 40,000. If its price depreciates by 20% annually:

sub_questions.label: a
sub_questions.question_nepali: 2 वर्षपछि उक्त कम्प्युटरको मूल्य कति हुन्छ ?
sub_questions.question_english: What will be the price of the computer after 2 years?
sub_questions.explanation_english:
Explanation: Using depreciation formula: $40000(0.8)^2 = 25,600$.
Citation: Lesson 3

context.nepali: रामसँग रु. 2,00,000 थियो । उसले अमेरिकन डलर साट्यो (विनिमय दर $1 = रु. 132) । केही दिनपछि नेपाली रुपैयाँ 10% ले अवमूल्यन भयो ।
context.english: Ram had Rs. 2,00,000. He exchanged it for US dollars (Exchange rate $1 = Rs. 132). A few days later, Nepali rupee devalued by 10%.

sub_questions.label: a
sub_questions.question_nepali: उसले कति डलर प्राप्त गर्यो (दशमलवको दुई स्थानसम्म) ?
sub_questions.question_english: How many dollars did he receive (up to two decimal places)?

context.nepali: एउटा त्रिभुजाकार प्रिज्मको आधारको क्षेत्रफल 24 वर्ग से.मि. र लम्बाइ 15 से.मि. छ ।
context.english: The base area of a triangular prism is 24 sq. cm and length is 15 cm.

sub_questions.label: a
sub_questions.question_english: Find the volume of the prism.
sub_questions.explanation_nepali:
प्रिज्मको आयतन = आधारको क्षेत्रफल $\times$ लम्बाइ = $24 \times 15 = 360$ घन से.मि.।
उद्धरण: पाठ ५
sub_questions.explanation_english:
Explanation: Volume of prism = Base Area $\times$ Length = $24 \times 15 = 360$.
Citation: Lesson 5

context.nepali: एउटा सोली र बेलनाको आधारको अर्धव्यास र उचाइ बराबर छन् ।
context.english: The radius of the base and height of a cone and a cylinder are equal.

sub_questions.label: a
sub_questions.question_english: What is the ratio of their volumes?
sub_questions.explanation_nepali:
सोलीको आयतन $\frac{1}{3}\pi r^2 h$ र बेलनाको आयतन $\pi r^2 h$ हुन्छ। अनुपात $\frac{1}{3}:1$ वा $1:3$।
उद्धरण: पाठ ५
sub_questions.explanation_english:
Explanation: Volume of cone is $1/3 \pi r^2 h$ and cylinder is $\pi r^2 h$. Ratio is $1:3$.
Citation: Lesson 5

context.nepali: एउटा वर्गाकार बगैंचाको लम्बाइ 40 मिटर छ । यसको वरिपरि बाहिरबाट 2 मिटर चौडा बाटो बनाइएको छ ।
context.english: The length of a square garden is 40 m. A path of width 2 m is constructed outside around it.

sub_questions.label: a
sub_questions.question_english: Find the area of the path.
sub_questions.explanation_english:
Explanation: Inner length 40, outer length 44. Area = $44^2 - 40^2 = 336$.
Citation: Lesson 5

context.nepali: यदि पहिलो $n$ प्राकृतिक संख्याहरूको योगफल 55 छ भने:
context.english: If the sum of the first $n$ natural numbers is 55:

sub_questions.label: a
sub_questions.explanation_nepali:
सूत्र $\frac{n(n+1)}{2} = 55 \Rightarrow n^2 + n - 110 = 0$। खण्डीकरण गर्दा $(n+11)(n-10)=0$, त्यसैले $n=10$।
उद्धरण: पाठ ६
sub_questions.explanation_english:
Explanation: Using formula $\frac{n(n+1)}{2} = 55$, we get quadratic $n^2+n-110=0$, solving gives $n=10$.
Citation: Lesson 6

sub_questions.label: a
sub_questions.explanation_nepali:
$y = 7 - 2x$ दोस्रो समीकरणमा राख्दा: $4x - 3(7-2x) + 1 = 0 \Rightarrow 4x - 21 + 6x + 1 = 0 \Rightarrow 10x = 20 \Rightarrow x=2$। $y = 3$।
उद्धरण: पाठ ७
sub_questions.explanation_english:
Explanation: Substituting $y=7-2x$ into second eq: $10x=20 \Rightarrow x=2$, then $y=3$.
Citation: Lesson 7

sub_questions.label: a
sub_questions.explanation_english:
Explanation: Taking cube root of each factor: $\sqrt[3]{3^3 (a^2)^3 b^3} = 3 a^2 b$.
Citation: Lesson 9

context.nepali: एउटा त्रिभुज र एउटा आयत एउटै आधार र उही समानान्तर रेखाहरू बिच बनेका छन् । आयतको क्षेत्रफल 40 वर्ग से.मि. भए त्रिभुजको क्षेत्रफल कति हुन्छ ?
context.english: A triangle and a rectangle stand on the same base and between the same parallel lines. If the area of the rectangle is 40 sq. cm, what is the area of the triangle?

sub_questions.label: a
sub_questions.explanation_nepali:
त्रिभुजको क्षेत्रफल आयतको आधा हुन्छ: $\frac{1}{2} \times 40 = 20$।
उद्धरण: पाठ १०
sub_questions.explanation_english:
Explanation: Area of triangle is half of the rectangle: $20$ sq cm.
Citation: Lesson 10

context.nepali: चक्रीय चतुर्भुज PQRS मा $\angle P = 80^\circ$ भए $\angle R$ को मान कति हुन्छ ?
context.english: In a cyclic quadrilateral PQRS, if $\angle P = 80^\circ$, what is the value of $\angle R$?

sub_questions.label: a
sub_questions.explanation_nepali:
सम्मुख कोणहरूको योग $180^\circ$ हुन्छ। $\angle R = 180 - 80 = 100^\circ$।
उद्धरण: पाठ १२
sub_questions.explanation_english:
Explanation: Opposite angles sum to 180: $180 - 80 = 100$.
Citation: Lesson 12

context.nepali: दुई समरूप त्रिभुजका क्षेत्रफलहरूको अनुपात 16:25 छ ।
context.english: The ratio of the areas of two similar triangles is 16:25.

sub_questions.label: a
sub_questions.question_nepali: तिनीहरूको सङ्गत भुजाहरूको अनुपात कति हुन्छ ?
sub_questions.question_english: What is the ratio of their corresponding sides?
sub_questions.explanation_nepali:
क्षेत्रफलको अनुपात भुजाहरूको वर्गको अनुपातसँग बराबर हुन्छ। भुजा अनुपात = $\sqrt{16}:\sqrt{25} = 4:5$।
उद्धरण: पाठ १०
sub_questions.explanation_english:
Explanation: Ratio of areas equals square of ratio of sides. Sides ratio = $\sqrt{16/25} = 4:5$.
Citation: Lesson 10

context.nepali: एउटा तथ्याङ्कको मध्यक 20 छ । यदि पदहरूको योगफल $\sum X = 200$ भए पद संख्या ($N$) पत्ता लगाउनुहोस् ।
context.english: The mean of a data set is 20. If the sum of terms $\sum X = 200$, find the number of terms ($N$).

sub_questions.label: a
sub_questions.explanation_english:
Explanation: Using Mean formula: $20 = 200/N \Rightarrow N=10$.
Citation: Lesson 13

context.nepali: निरन्तर श्रेणीमा $N = 40$ भए मध्यिका पर्ने स्थान कुन हो ?
context.english: In a continuous series, if $N = 40$, which is the position of the median?

sub_questions.label: a
sub_questions.explanation_nepali:
निरन्तर श्रेणीमा मध्यिकाको स्थान $\frac{N}{2}$ औं पद हो = $\frac{40}{2} = 20$।
उद्धरण: पाठ १३
sub_questions.explanation_english:
Explanation: For continuous series, Median class position is $N/2 = 20$th item.
Citation: Lesson 13

context.nepali: एउटा लुडोको गोटी उचाल्दा 4 भन्दा सानो अंक आउने सम्भाव्यता कति हुन्छ ?
context.english: When a die is rolled, what is the probability of getting a number less than 4?

sub_questions.label: a
sub_questions.explanation_nepali:
4 भन्दा साना अंकहरू {1, 2, 3} हुन् (3 वटा)। सम्भाव्यता = $\frac{3}{6} = \frac{1}{2}$।
उद्धरण: पाठ १४
sub_questions.explanation_english:
Explanation: Numbers less than 4 are {1, 2, 3}. Probability = $3/6 = 1/2$.
Citation: Lesson 14
